div.p:
Curia Capitalis Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio
burgi eiusdem vndecimo die mensis Januarij Anno Domini millesimo
Quingentesimo Sexto Quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes
patent in Rotulo Sectis

Johannes Watsone in garntuly
thomas Dauysone
Andreas Watsone in cullan
Alexander leitht
Robertus Dauisone in banchory Devny
Willelmus Richerdsone in fordys'
Walterus layng in monecabok
Andreas Watsone in newburgh
Andreas Johnsone' in fingask
Thomas Watsone in gewillis
Johannes mar in Dys'
Thomas Wodman
Johannes Wilyesone in cromar
georgeus Jhonsone
Dauid hay
Willelmus lindesay
Willelmus laysk
Johannes brekauche'

Alexander gray Duncanus collisone Dauid steuart Willelmus portar patricius
Reid' Johnnes blak matheus branche gavinus murray andreas stevinsone
Robertus Waus andreas lousone Johannes ramsay Johannes auchneyve
Patricius leslie Dauid fynne Dauid adamsone Johannes Kintor Johannes
murray Andreas stratone alexander malisone et thomas lousone burgenses
dictj burgj Jurati dicunt quod quondam Annabella Kintor auia Robertj
hill latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestita et sasita vt de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de tercia parte vnius croftj Jacente ex parte boreali
vicj regij quo Itur ad molendina Justiciarij inter croftum Johannis cullan'
ex orientali ex vna et croftum Alexandri Reid' ex occidentali partibus ab altera Et
croftum Alexandrj mar versus boream Et communionem viam regiam versus austrum
Et quod dictus Robertus est vnus de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus dicte
quondam Annabelle auie sue / de dicta terra parte crofti cum pertinencijs Et
quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra pars crofti valet nunc per annum
xviiij s' Et valuit decim s' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de
suppremo domino nostro regis Per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in
manibus domini nostrj regis legittime per se ipsum per decessum dicte quondam Johannis
Wormet Annabelle per spacium aut eocirca in defectu
verj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdenne vncedimo die mensis Januarij anno
Domini millesimo quingentesimo sexto coram honorabilibus viris Johanne Colisone et
thoma Wod' duobus balliuorum dicti burgj in pretorio eiusdem in curia capitali sedenti
per subscriptos videlicet Alexandrum gray Duncanum Colisone Dauid steuart Willelmum portar patricium
red' Johannem blak matheum branche gavinum murray Andream stevinsone Robertum Waus
Andream lousone Johannem ramsay Johannem auchneiwe patricium leslie Dauid fynne Dauid Adamson'
Johannem Kintor Johannem murray Andream stratone Alexandrum malisone et thomam lousoune burgeneses dicti burgj
Qui Jurati dicunt quod quondam Annabella Kinto auia'

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes Arnot minister
domus sancte trinitatis de abirdene et protestabatur in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum vsualis monete scocie sibi annuatim
debito de quadam terra vasta quondam thome cullane Jactente in le gastraw
inter terram alexander malisone ex boreali ex vna et d terra quondam domini Andree
gray capellanj ex australi partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus
oriens Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die
huius processus Testibus Willelmo King Johanne brabner et normundo lesly seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram honestus vir Andreas lousone burgensis
dictj burgj et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
duarum marcarum monete scocie sibi debito de quadam terra vasta interiore Johannis
malisone Jacente in vico castrj dictj burgj ex boreali parte eiusdem vicj inter
terram thome lesly et andree mortimer ex occidentali et terram heredum quondam Willelmi
buchane ex orientali et terram anteriore ipsius Johannis ex australi in
defectu solucionis dictj annuj redditus Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo
Walcar alexandro hay et Willelmo scrimgeor seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Johannes
marscheale capellanus perpetuus altaris sanctj ninianj confessoris situati
infra ecclesiam parrochialam sanctj nicholaij de abirdene et protestatus fuit in
forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum monete
scocie sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debito et a longo tempore non soluto de
quadam Pena terre vaste Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico viridi apud
bonum fratrum carmelitarum dicti burgj ex boreali parte eiusdem vici inter communiones
vias regias versus austrum et occidens et terram Johannis Durward'
versus boream et communionem venellam siue viam regiam versus oriens Ad
quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus
Testibus Roberto Walcar Johanne low scissor et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram venereabilis vir magistri Dauid menyeis
capellanus perpetuus altaris sanctj patri apostoli infra ecclesiam parrochialiem
sanctj nicholaij de abirdene situati Et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo redditu quinque solidorum vsualis monete scocie sibi et dicto altari
annuatim a longo tempore debito et non soluto de quadam terra vasta martinj
Kemp Jacente in le gren' inter terram Rogeri Wyrrecorle ex australi et
terram thome gledstane ex boreali et communionem viam regiam versus occidens
Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos balliuis in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam 3o secundo die huius processus
Testibus henrico andersone Johanne colly et andrea nachtj sergeando

Eodem die tribus processibus deductis et perlectis per discretum virum dominum
andream collisone capellanum altaris sanctj michaelis fundati per quondam bone
memorie matheum fechat de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis
cuiusdam terre vaste Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico superiore ecclesie eiusdem
inter terram Donaldi strathachin ex occidentali ex vna et torrentem sine
aqueductum ad molendinum superius discendens versus oriens et communionem viam
regiam versus boream in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus sex
solidorum et octo denariorum sibi de dicta terra debito et a longo tempore non
soluto Vnde dictus dominus andreas pecijt a balliuis sibi fieri de dicta terra
Juris et Justicie complementum secundum tenorem suj processus precedens Et
consequenter dominus Dauid leill prelocutor dictj dominj andree porrexit plegium
in manibus normandj lesly sergeandi quod ipse dominus andreas proprietatem et
possessionem dicte terre cum pertinenciis legitime recuperauit in defectu solucionis
dictj annuj redditus Vnde hora diei legittime expectata omnibus Interesse
habenti et nullo comparenti nec opponenti decretum fuit per curiam et datum
pro iudicio per os alexandri Joffrasone Judicatoris dicte curie quod ipse
dominus Andreas causam suam obtinuit in recuperacione proprietatis dicte terre
cum pertinenciji Super quibus dictus dominus andreas pecijt Instrumentum sigillis
balliuorum tunc presencium Roborandum Testibus Willelmo Wormet Dauid straloche
Roberto Waus Dauid colp Dauid broys' Willelmo mylne et Willelmo
scrimgeor sergeando

The siad' day patry chernsid' grauntit to pay to William Stile in the
gallougat xxxix s' and viij d' or caus' him be pait betuix this ande
fastirinevin nixt to Cum for Alexander hay In banff

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij die
mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The saide day thomas Wode ane the balyeis of the said' Complenyet
that patry chernsid' hede tribulit him and the said' patry accusit denyit
the said tribulance and allegit the said' thomas hed' tribulit him quhilkis
he denyit and in continent thareftir the said' actionez' was put to the decisioun'
of ane assis' of thir personis follouing with consent of batht the said partiis that
is to say Dauid menyeis Jonhne Cullan James Colisone Johne ratre
Duncan fyf mathou banche thomas laysk Alexander bannerman Dauid fynne
Jonhne Kintor Androw Waus Jonhne arthour' Androw stevinsone thomas
Watsone george bysset Androw stratone Williame Kintor Johne meldrum
and Williame stile burges of the said' burghe quhilkis riplie avisit
the gret aithe Suorne the witnes preuis richtis and allegacionis
of batht the said partiis herde seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit ale mane
concordand' that thai coud' nocht quyt the said' patry of trubulance of
the said' thomas Wod' bailye for the quhilkis he was in amerciament
of the court et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum
Ande atour thai coud nocht acquit the said' thomas of tribulance of the said'
patry And' thai fand the prouocacioun' of the said' trubulance of the said' movit
in the said patry' chernsid' Ande the aldirman and balyeis ordanit the
said' patry to Comper befor him the balyeis and Counsale one friday
that next cumis tile mak Amendis to the said' balye quhilk Oblist
him to comper the said' hay be his hand' vphaldin

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
Januarij anno quo supra

The said' day Comperit patrik chernsid' one that ane part Ande
thomas Wod' balye on that vthir part oblist thame be the
fathtis of thir bodiis to stand' and abid' at the ordinance of the
aldirman and Counsale Anent the trubulance done to the saide
balye quhilkis riplie auisit ordanit and deliuerit that the said patry
sale cum one Sonday that next Cumis in tyme of the hie mes'
with ane Candile of wax contening thre li' in his hande ande
offir to the hald blud' licht bair' hed' and with his knif dravin in his hand'
and deliuerit to the said' thomas be the hest and ask him for
giwnes and ask the aldirman forgiwnes thar in the tovnis
name Ande pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin
for the Offence and trubulance committit to the said' balye

The said' day Dauid bannerman was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Alexander gray
forspekar for forstalling of the burghe in bying of Skinnis et cetera extendit to vj s'
and viij d'

The said' day Jonhne brekoche conuict' be the said' assis' Alexander gray forspekar
for forstalling of the burghe' in bying of Skinnis hidis and Regrating and
extentit to xv s'

The said' day Duncan Wandy was conuict be the said' assis' for forstalling
of the burghe' in bying of Skinnis and hidis et cetera and extentit to xx s'

head.add: the Redeming of the buthtis fra the ayris of Robert' Cullan

div.p:
The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander gray
forspekar that Eilzabetht turing the Relict of vmquhile Adam Cullane
has lauchfullie Redemyt outquit and lousit the buthtis chop and loftis
liand' within the said' burghe wedset tile vmquhile Robert Cullane in
the gret land' of Johne Cullanis anent the chakirraw fra the ayris
of vmquhile the said' Robert and thar tutoris the said' Elizibetht or thomas
laisk hir spous' payand' to the profit of the saide ayris the half of the mertimes
maile of the said' buthtis and last bigane Ande atour It was deliuerit that the
said' Elizibetht and thomas laysk hir' spous' Sale haue the chartiris ande
Instrumentis deliuerit to thame of the annalenacioun' and wedset of the samyn and
the Reuersion' to be distroit thareftir

The said day Duncan fyf grantit him aving to Alexander malysone ane franche
Crovne of gold' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said' day Johne low was in amerciament of the Court in defalt of presence as he that
was lauchfullie summond' and warnit to comper and comperit nocht tile ansuer at
the Instance of Androw bavne et cetera

The saide day It was ordanit be the aldirman ande the Counsale
that sere Williame Couapr sale content and pay to thome chamer
sangstar tuentj Schillingis of the first and rediast money that beis
gottin of his Clerkschip at the next pasche Ande atour thai grantit
to the said' thomas tuentj s' to be tane of ane burges the first that
happinis to be gottin

The saide day thome Pyile talyour' was conuict' be ane Suorne assis'
alexander gray forspekar for trubulance of Johne of murray for the quhilkis he
was in amerciament of the court' et cetera and he sale pay j li' of wax to the haly
blud licht

The said' day thomas Waus declarit that Jonhne low smitht oblist
him be the fatht of his bodie befor him to releiwe Androw bavne
of vij s' at the handis of gilbert prestone within xv dais

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die mensis Januarij Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman with awis' of the Counsale present for the
tyme licencit and leysit Androw Walcar' to work quhile michaelmes
next hereftir becaus' he Is ane puirman

head.add: Statut' anent bying of tynning wescheale

div.p:
The saide day was statut and ordanit be the aldirman and counsale
that ale the peuteraris of this burghe' sal present ale the peutar
that suspect personis presentis to sele / to the Officiaris of the burghe'
or thai by it and be Suorne tharto

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' ser Johne
ruthirfurd' forspekar that William burges is aving to Androw meldrum
xij s' and quhat mair' he may present aving to him thai ordanit
him to tak ane day and preiwe It quhilk Androw tuk to preiwe
the said' William aving to him iij s' of Siluer and demi petir of wole

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij
die mensis Januarij Anno quo supra

The said day besse tuliboy was conuict be ane suorn' assis' Johnne
mar forspekar for the tribulance of tibbe Weir and' amens' as law
will and' forbeir in tyme to cum And' the said tibbe was conuict be
the said assis' for the tribulance of the said' besse tuliboy and'
thai fand the prouocacioun' in the said tybbe for the quhilkis sche
was in ane amerciament of the Court and' to amend' as lawe
will and' forbeir in tyme to cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die Januarij
anno quo supra

The said' day Alexander hay lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit tile ansuer to the
Complaint in strintht of ane borghe' fundin and gevin one him be mastir Johne
marscheale et cetera was in ane amerciament of the court et cetera Atour the aldirman and balyeis chargit
William scrimgeor to pas and tak ane stres' of the said' Alexander et cetera and warne
him to Comper this day xv dais tile ansuer to the said' complant

The said' day Richerd' Waus tuk to preiwe one friday that next cumis that
he hed' pait mastir thomas chameris maile excepe x d'

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdenn' tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo nono
die mensis Januarij anno quo supra

The said day hare scot grantit him avand to ha Robert Kennerty xiij mettis
of salt quhilkis the bailyes chargit him to pay withtin terme of lawe

The said day the bailyes assignit this day xv dais to Dauid Kintor
to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be William burges for the
wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ane cowe prisit to xviij s' and'
prommittit to him be thome Dunbrek

The said' day mastir thomas chamer said that Richerd Waus sat in
his land' and' pait him nocht a penny this yer bigan' bot It that he
pait for the annuell

The said day William the borgh' fundin one William scrogis
be Robert Waus was fundin awaill for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra him of ane half nett be the mouth of patry Red' forspekar
for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and'
aw to deliuer the said half netht to the said' Robert

The said day Robert gib duelland' in away oblist him be the
faitht of his bodie to pay to Johnne grig xl s' ffourty schillingis
scottis money tharof tuenty schillingis at Witsonday nixt hereftir
And' vthir tuenty s' at yuyll nixt thareftir

The said' day Johne low tuk to preiwe that he resauit bot vj stane of yrne fra
Androw lousone quhar' he allegit he hed' resauit viij stane and the balyeis assignit
to him the first day of februar' next to cum to preiwe that he resauit bot vj stane

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdeine tenta in pretorio eiusdem
penultimo die mensis Januarij Anno quo supra

The said day Robert Waus grantit him awand to Johnne of
mar ane half nett quhilkis the bailyes chargit him to pay
within terme of lawe

Eodem die Joneta ogistone sponsa Johannis mar fecit constituit creauit
nominauit et ordinauit dictum Johannem suum verum legittimum et Indubitatum
procuratorem ad prosequendum Willelmum scrogis pro vna barele le grils'
dans et concedens eisdem ac suis substitutis pluribus aut vnj summam in
tegram presentatem pro se et nomine suo agendum defendendum calumpniandum
Ceteram omniam et singulam faciendum in vberiore forma procuratorij
cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportuniis promittens de Rato et grato
